metadata.title: CVE-2020-15692 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In Nim 1.2.4, the standard library browsers mishandles the URL argument tobrowsers.openDefaultBrowser. This argument can be a local file path thatwill be opened in the default explorer. An attacker can pass one argumentto the underlying open command to execute arbitrary registered systemcommands.

criterions.comment: nim: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
